author: Tony Tobin
method: Place the white wine, double cream and turmeric into a pan over a medium heat. Bring up to the boil then reduce the heat to simmer for three minutes. Add the cooked pasta and mussels and cook for a further three minutes, until the mussels are warmed through. To serve, pour into a bowl and top with the chopped chives.
ingredients: 50ml/2fl oz white wine,  100ml/3½fl oz double cream,  pinch turmeric powder,  150g/5½oz fresh pasta, cooked according to packet instructions,  75g/2¾oz cooked mussels from a jar, rinsed and drained,  2 tbsp chopped fresh chives
